xxx.id AS id, xxx.stock_po_id AS stockPoId, xxx.stock_po_code AS stockPoCode, xxx.stock_po_list_id AS stockPoListId, xxx.material_id AS materialId, xxx.material_code AS materialCode, xxx.material_short_name AS materialShortName, xxx.material_spec AS materialSpec, xxx.out_stock_id AS outStockId, xxx.out_stock_code AS outStockCode, xxx.out_stock_name AS outStockName, xxx.in_stock_id AS inStockId, xxx.in_stock_code AS inStockCode, xxx.in_stock_name AS inStockName, xxx.out_stock_place_id AS outStockPlaceId, xxx.out_stock_place_code AS outStockPlaceCode, xxx.out_stock_place_name AS outStockPlaceName, xxx.in_stock_place_id AS inStockPlaceId, xxx.in_stock_place_code AS inStockPlaceCode, xxx.in_stock_place_name AS inStockPlaceName, xxx.bar_code AS barCode, xxx.in_batch_no AS inBatchNo, xxx.batch_no AS batchNo, xxx.qty AS qty, xxx.units_id AS unitsId, xxx.units_name AS unitsName, xxx.in_out_type_propert AS inOutTypePropert, xxx.state AS state, xxx.suppliar_id AS suppliarId, xxx.suppliar_code AS suppliarCode, xxx.suppliar_name AS suppliarName, xxx.client_id AS clientId, xxx.client_code AS clientCode, xxx.client_name AS clientName, xxx.carrier_id AS carrierId, xxx.carrier_name AS carrierName, xxx.car_num AS carNum, xxx.is_car AS isCar, xxx.f_company_id AS fCompanyId, xxx.f_en_code AS fEnCode, xxx.f_short_name AS fShortName, xxx.create_id AS createId, xxx.create_name AS createName, xxx.create_time AS createTime, xxx.update_id AS updateId, xxx.update_name AS updateName, xxx.update_time AS updateTime, xxx.remark AS remark, xxx.is_valid AS isValid,
mapper.select:
select
from mes_wms_stockpobatch
is_valid = '1'
and id = #{id}
and stock_po_id = #{stockPoId}
and stock_po_code like concat('%',#{stockPoCode},'%')
and stock_po_list_id = #{stockPoListId}
and material_id = #{materialId}
and material_code like concat('%',#{materialCode},'%')
and material_short_name like concat('%',#{materialShortName},'%')
and material_spec like concat('%',#{materialSpec},'%')
and out_stock_id = #{outStockId}
and out_stock_code like concat('%',#{outStockCode},'%')
and out_stock_name like concat('%',#{outStockName},'%')
and in_stock_id = #{inStockId}
and in_stock_code like concat('%',#{inStockCode},'%')
and in_stock_name like concat('%',#{inStockName},'%')
and out_stock_place_id = #{outStockPlaceId}
and out_stock_place_code like concat('%',#{outStockPlaceCode},'%')
and out_stock_place_name like concat('%',#{outStockPlaceName},'%')
and in_stock_place_id = #{inStockPlaceId}
and in_stock_place_code like concat('%',#{inStockPlaceCode},'%')
and in_stock_place_name like concat('%',#{inStockPlaceName},'%')
and bar_code like concat('%',#{barCode},'%')
and in_batch_no like concat('%',#{inBatchNo},'%')
and batch_no like concat('%',#{batchNo},'%')
and qty
and units_id = #{unitsId}
and units_name like concat('%',#{unitsName},'%')
and in_out_type_propert like concat('%',#{inOutTypePropert},'%')
and state like concat('%',#{state},'%')
and suppliar_id = #{suppliarId}
and suppliar_code like concat('%',#{suppliarCode},'%')
and suppliar_name like concat('%',#{suppliarName},'%')
and client_id = #{clientId}
and client_code like concat('%',#{clientCode},'%')
and client_name like concat('%',#{clientName},'%')
and carrier_id = #{carrierId}
and carrier_name like concat('%',#{carrierName},'%')
and car_num like concat('%',#{carNum},'%')
and is_car like concat('%',#{isCar},'%')
and f_company_id like concat('%',#{fCompanyId},'%')
and f_en_code like concat('%',#{fEnCode},'%')
and f_short_name like concat('%',#{fShortName},'%')
and create_id = #{createId}
and create_name like concat('%',#{createName},'%')
and create_time
and update_id = #{updateId}
and update_name like concat('%',#{updateName},'%')
and update_time
and remark like concat('%',#{remark},'%')
and is_valid like concat('%',#{isValid},'%')
order by id desc

select id, stock_po_id, stock_po_code, stock_po_list_id, material_id, material_code, material_short_name, material_spec, out_stock_id, out_stock_code, out_stock_name, in_stock_id, in_stock_code, in_stock_name, out_stock_place_id, out_stock_place_code, out_stock_place_name, in_stock_place_id, in_stock_place_code, in_stock_place_name, bar_code, in_batch_no, batch_no, qty, units_id, units_name, in_out_type_propert, state, suppliar_id, suppliar_code, suppliar_name, client_id, client_code, client_name, carrier_id, carrier_name, car_num, is_car, f_company_id, f_en_code, f_short_name, create_id, create_name, create_time, update_id, update_name, update_time, remark, is_valid from mes_wms_stockpobatch where id = #{id}
